name: 4chan - Night Owl
description: A dark theme for 4chan that allows the user to customize a link and accent color for a slightly more personalized theme. Enjoy! Please leave me feedback here. It helps me know what you want and what needs to be fixed so I can make my theme better, so please give descriptive feedback. If you like my theme, I would appreciate it if you would comment on and rate it.

Changelog

[1.1.0]

[1.0.0]
-Initial release.
*This theme has only been tested on the "Yotsuba" style on /a/, /b/, /c/, /d/, /e/, /f/, /g/, /gif/, /h/, /hr/, /k/, /m/ and /o/ thus far.

Note
-The pictures in the screenshots are crystallized to reduce file size.
